summary: Makes Lucy Ellen and Carly Jo adoptable, Others will join soon.
descriptionHtml:
You may be asking who these two are, they are my real life daughters. They love it when I play and always want me to adopt Lucia and Sofie and then they pretend to each be one of them. So I just changed their names to match my girls and they smile big when they see it. This is my first mod as well, I know it's not much but I have more things in the pipeline for mods so wish me luck.

Lucy Ellen can be found in Whiterun and Carly Jo can be found in Windhelm.

Requires full game with hearthfire DLC.
Thanks to my wonderful girls for the inspiration.

Future plans are to add more children as well.
Changed name to reflect future plans.
author: Megahut
